LIVE.DESCRIPTION: Notify when an unattended live/premier starts
LIVE.TITLE: Unattended Live

RESCHEDULE.DESCRIPTION: Notify when a live/premier is rescheduled
RESCHEDULE.TITLE: Reschedule

SCHEDULE.DESCRIPTION: Notify when the channel schedule a new live/premier
SCHEDULE.TITLE: Schedule

UPCOMING.DESCRIPTION: Notify when 5 minutes before live/premier starts
UPCOMING.TITLE: Upcoming
